markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, these five faculties don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training. What five? The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom. These five faculties don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.”

SN.48.61. Saṁyojanasutta (“Fetters”)

children.value:
“Mendicants, these five faculties don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.
What five?
The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
These five faculties don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.”
